abstract: United States is reportedly looking for ways to accelerate aerial attacks on Islamic State militants in Iraq, including training Iraqis to spot targets.
lead_paragraph: The idea would be to accelerate aerial attacks, which the Iraqis say are taking too long.

headline.main: U.S. Weighs Training Iraqis to Call in American Airstrikes in ISIS Fight
headline.print_headline: U.S. Might Train Iraqis to Call in Strikes on ISIS

snippet: The idea would be to accelerate aerial attacks, which the Iraqis say are taking too long.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
